Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Yara Luna Kuipers's parents, having known her since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
Yara Luna Kuipers is a 68 year old retired Maritime Industry Leader from Netherlands. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Yara Luna Kuipers is married to Mulders. Yara and Mulders have 1 child, named Stam.
Education Background:
Yara graduated from Meerwaert College Weesp in 1974.
Yara graduated from NWO - Netherlands Organisation for Scientific Research in 1981, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 45 years, Yara Luna Kuipers has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Yara Luna Kuipers's first role was as a Ship Broker at CMA CGM Nederland B.V., where she worked diligently from 1980 to 1981 to establish a strong reputation.
She then transitioned to A.P. Moller-Maersk Group as a Shipping Company Owner, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 1983 to 1984.
She spent 2 years working as a Fleet Manager at CMA CGM Nederland B.V., refining her expertise and building a strong network.
She appointment as a Maritime Industry Leader at A.P. Moller-Maersk Group in 1990 marked a significant milestone in her career, as she took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 2250000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Tilburg and Hengelo, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In summary, Yara has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
